final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    subgraph MyMuffin
        A([New Order]) -->|orders is receiving| B{ParallelGateway}
        B -->|start to prepare dough| C[Prepare dough]
        B -->|start prepare cooking paper| D[prepare cooking paper]
        B -->|Start set up delivery| E[set up delivery]
        C --> F{ParallelGateway}
        D --> F
        E --> F
        F -->|Phase 2| G[prepare muffins]
        G -->|start Cooking| H[cook muffins]
        H --> I{XORGateway}
        I -->|Ready to Dispatch| J[Dispatch muffins]
        I -->|Start to Payment| K[payment]
        K -->|payment is completed| L{ParallelGateway}
        J -->|Dispatch is completed| L
        L --> M([end of process])
        
        %% Payment Details
        K -.->|Payment #1| P1[PayPal]
        K -.->|Payment #1| P2[Apple Pay]
        K -.->|Payment #2| P3[gold gift card]
        K -.->|Payment #2| P4[temporary gift card]
        K -.->|Refunding Policy| P5[Refunding Policy]

        %% Cooking Details
        H -.->|oven temperature| C1[oven temperature]
        H -.->|tip 1 in cooking| C2[tip 1 in cooking]
        H -.->|cook time| C3[cook time]
        H -.->|tip 2 in cooking| C4[tip 2 in cooking]
    end
